original_text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord: he did according to all that his father Uzziah had done.
korean_text: 요담이 그의 아버지 웃시야의 모든 행위대로 여호와께서 보시기에 정직히 행하였으나

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was right
in the sight of the Lord:
that his father Uzziah had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 웃시야가 행한 것 같이 하였더라
